item.title: Vulnerability Databases
item.description: In this post I wanted to go over some of the findings I have found when doing research into how vulnerability scoring works with vulnerability databases. CVE List The Common Enumeration of Vulnerabilities (CVE) List is a database of reported vulnerabilities maintained by the Mitre Corporation. Vulnerabilities found can be submitted by organizations and even individuals. Each vulnerability is given a CVE-ID number to identify by. This list of CVE-ID’s is used by many other databases for application use and scoring.

item.title: Mulesoft Security Capabilities
item.description: After working with Mulesoft for a while, I wanted to write this blog post because I didn’t see very many resourse that were comprehensive on Mulesoft and it’s security capabilities. Many of these findings were by google searching, reviewing Mulesoft documentation and talking with Mulesoft reps for security capabilities. This post is not intented to include all of Mulesoft security capabilities but is just good starter for those looking to use Mulesoft security.

item.title: Baspi Installation
item.description: The BASpi is a raspberry pi HAT that can turn your raspbery pi into a configurable BACnet device. BACnet devices are used in commercial HVAC building automation. It is how large commercial buildings are able to trigger during a certain time of day or trigger from another sensor. For example, a BACnet devices can be used for turning down and turning up building air conditioning during certain times of day or year.

item.title: Favorite Open Source Projects
item.description: Here is a list of some open source projects I thought were fun and interesting. I will continually update this list of projects I find. Application Security: Brakeman Scanner: Able to detect vulnerabilities on the latest Ruby on Rails version. OWASP Dependency-Check: Able to detect vulnerabilities in project’s depedencies. Secure Code Game An application security coding game tuned for developers to correct vulnerabilities found. CodeQL Open source code scanning tool provided by GitHub.
